description:
Nourish and protect your Texas lawn with Texas Green

Texas Green is a liquid lawn fertilizer expertly developed for the varied soils and climates of Texas.

Suitable for all Texas grass types, it's enriched with slow-release nitrogen and potassium to support sustained greening, even in extreme heat. This formula optimally manages hydration and encourages robust growth, fortifying your lawn against the harsh Texas environment.

Consciously formulated without pesticides, Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's unique environmental challenges.

sections.product_features:
22-0-2 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) liquid fertilizer for Texas lawns
Specially formulated for higher pH soils, climate, and heat of Texas lawns
Ideal for regular lawn feeding and maintenance of Texas lawns
Slow-release nitrogen for prolonged greening, and potash for soil hydration management
Made for all types of grass in Texas
Zero pesticides
User-friendly hose-on application
Covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
Includes liquid fertilizer in flexible reduced plastic packaging and a custom-engineered universal hose-end sprayer
sections.ingredients: Slow-release Nitrogen: Ensures extended greening and growth
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Connect the universal sprayer to your hose and the fertilizer pouch. This sprayer is designed for the optimal mix of water and nutrients.
Apply the fertilizer across your lawn until the pouch is empty, which should take about 10-15 minutes. Once the fertilizer dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4-6 weeks spring through fall. Keep the sprayer for future applications.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How to use with other Sunday products?
If using other Sunday products, let liquid fertilizers dry completely before applying anything else to the lawn. For best results, use lawn fertilizer in combination with weed control and grass seed. This will help you feed properly, reduce weeds, and introduce better grasses to your lawn.
Application based on yard size:
1,000–2,500 sq. ft.: 1/2 pouch
2,500–5,000 sq. ft.: 1 pouch
5,000–10,000 sq. ft.: 2 pouches
How does fertilizer help my grass, and how is Sunday liquid fertilizer different?
Grass needs nutrients to thrive. Fertilizer provides these essential nutrients, and enhances growth, color, and resilience. Sunday liquid fertilizers offer rapid absorption for quicker results and uniquely enrich the soil while nourishing your lawn—all without pesticides for a healthier yard.
How much lawn fertilizer will I need?
For each treatment: Each fertilizer pouch covers 5,000 sq. ft. for one treatment. The number of pouches you receive in for each application will depend on your lawn size.
For the growing season: Most lawns benefit from applying between 3-6 applications in a growing season (typically spring-fall)
When is the best time to apply fertilizer to my lawn?
For optimal results, fertilize your lawn when grass is actively growing. Apply early in the morning or in the evening when temperatures are between 50 to 85 degrees F to a lawn that's well-hydrated.
How do I care for my lawn after fertilizer is applied?
After applying, let the lawn dry before normal use or applying other treatments. It's best to wait a day before watering, two days before mowing, and avoid applying fertilizer if rain is forecast within 24 hours.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states
